channel.title: Trollbox suggestion
channel.description:
Toolbox should have unlimited uses or something like 3 times per day. We need to defeat this repeat or double line entry meta. Trollbox is rarely effective and usually only on newbies. It becomes increasingly harder to use as the players experience goes up.
Unlimited box forces people to investigate and actually deduce whether that person is who they say or "not say."

item.title: Trollbox suggestion
item.dc:creator: Vandalay
item.description:
jabba:

Unlimited everyday would just result in trolling, but moving towards 3 a day would definitely help the “8 repeat?” cop out.

IMO it just forces people to spam
3 is unseen
3 is unseen
3 is unseen
3 is unseen

When people know the hard limit, you can intentionally move past it. Plus even if you don’t say “repeat”, you say “did you say X”, and if there’s a “no I didn’t say that”, it doesn’t matter how many times he says it, you know there’s a trollbox interfering one way or the other.

item.title: Trollbox suggestion
item.dc:creator: Vandalay
item.description:
It’s still defeatable relatively easy though.

“3 did you actually say bob is unseen”
3. Yes
3. No I did not must be a trollbox
3. Yes I did that was a trollbox

Even with the minor amount of subjectivity that is the possibility of a reverse trollbox (IE trollboxing legitimate claims to make them look like trollboxes), you still pretty much have it. The real trick to trollboxing effectively is to do it in statements that don’t trigger any alarms at the time, but are likely to be remembered later on.

I like doing simple things like “I was occupied”, then 2 days later he posts his logs, and I trollbox someone else
“didn’t you say you were occupied day 2?”
